original_text:
“Beware of your friends;
    do not trust anyone in your clan.
For every one of them is a deceiver,
    and every friend a slanderer.
korean_text: 너희는 각기 이웃을 조심하며 어떤 형제든지 믿지 말라 형제마다 완전히 속이며 이웃마다 다니며 비방함이라

sentences.original_text: do not trust anyone in your clan
sentences.korean_translation: 네 씨족 중 어떤 사람도 믿지 말라

sentences.original_text: For every one of them is a deceiver
